t: Confirmed: These Press-On Nails Are Just as Good as Going to the Salon
s: July 29, 2024 - Glowing Editor Review: “I swear by OPI press-ons and have tried nearly all the long length styles. They are thicker and sturdier than those plastic-y other brands and truly last on about two weeks without popping off. After that, they do start to lift and get a little wiggly, but this helps with removal so I’m not mad about it. They’ll chip and fade a little bit around that time too, but there are enough nails in the pack for a re-up! Application is suuuper easy and quick...

t: The Beauty of Amazon's "Press Release" Process
s: February 7, 2021 - I previously wrote about The Beauty of Amazon's 6-Pager and why I felt it was a fundamental innovation that improves Amazon's ability to scale its decision-making processes as a rapidly growing company. I feel similarly about Amazon's working backwards process of writing the press release first.
